mapper.select:
select suo.* from sys_user_online suo
and suo.ipaddr like concat('%', #{userOnline.ipaddr}, '%')
and suo.login_name like concat('%', #{userOnline.loginName}, '%')
select * from sys_user_online where #{lastAccessTime} >= last_access_time order by last_access_time
mapper.insert: replace into sys_user_online(session_id, login_name, dept_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, start_timestamp, last_access_time, expire_time) values (#{sessionId}, #{loginName}, #{deptName}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{status}, #{startTimestamp}, #{lastAccessTime}, #{expireTime})
